job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Apply statistics, mathematics, data science, machine learning techniques and solutions meet software requirements.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Design and implement machine learning architecture and methods per client’s requirement.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Enhance and maintain current analysis tools, including automation of current processes using AI/ML algorithms.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Build supervised and un-supervised models for risk prediction, anomaly detection and timeseries analysis.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Conduct quantitative data analysis using a variety of large structured and unstructured datasets, including developing retrieval, processing, fusion, analysis, and visualization of various datasets.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Identify and test hypotheses, ensuring statistical significance, as part of building predictive models for business application.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Translate quantitative analysis, findings into accessible visuals for non-technical audiences, and provide a clear view into data interpretation.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Enable business to make clear tradeoffs between and among choices, with a reasonable view into likely outcomes.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Maintain understanding of strategic goals, business challenges and customer needs.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Write clean scripts for data analysis, ETL, and visualization.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Prepare and present findings of investigations & solutions to stakeholder.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Help your team understand use of various analytics/statical/ machine learning tools and methods.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Bring your curiosity, innovative spirit, and passion to deliver on the promise of technology in a difficult, competitive, and exciting vertical.&nbsp;Required Qualifications&nbsp;& Experience:·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Master’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Applied Statistics, or related field.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience 3+ years with machine learning in industry environment.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience 5+ years coding in Python, Scala, or similar.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Advanced understanding of probability, statistics, machine learning, data science.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Expertise in data correlation/feature analysis, analysis of machine learning models, and optimizing models for accuracy.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Proficiency in transforming and cleaning data & working across multiple models.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to research and manipulate complex and large data sets (both distributed and non-distributed).·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong fundamentals in problem solving, algorithm design, and model building.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to solve complex business problem through logical and creative thinking.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong ability to synthesize complex information.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Excellent Code writing capability in Python&nbsp;and familiarity with relevant ML packages.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with libraries such as Pandas, Scikit-learn etc.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience of working on Fraud detection solution.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Excellent knowledge of anomalies/outliers detection using unsupervised algorithms – clustering, Local Outlier Factor, Isolation Forest , etc.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Deep learning experience would be added advantage.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with Spark DataBricks frameworks.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Interest in applying data science in the fields of compliance.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong written and verbal communication skills.&nbsp;Title: Data Science AnalystRoles & Responsibilities  - Partner with clients to develop strong understanding of business needs and use business understanding to help design effective analytical solutions.   
  - Perform all data preparation and exploratory data analysis steps.   
  - Apply common statistical methods, data modeling to answer strategic questions for the business.   
  - Mine complex digital behavioral data, unveil insights and transform it into actionable information.   
  - Conduct quantitative data analysis using a variety of large structured and unstructured datasets including developing retrieval, processing, fusion, analysis, and visualization of various datasets.   
  - Identify and test hypotheses, ensuring statistical significance, as part of building predictive models for business application.   
  - Translate findings into succinct, actionable business insights, and coordinate with technical/ business partners to prepare holistic story.   
  - Use advanced data visualization techniques to communicate solutions to business stakeholders.   
  - Guide implementation, testing, and evaluation of models.   
  - Present methodology and findings of analysis to a broad range of audiences, including both technical and non-technical, at all levels of the organization.   
  - Enable business to make clear tradeoffs between and among choices, with a reasonable view into likely outcomes.   
  - Collaborate closely with other members of the analytics and data science team and the Harman data science community.   
  - Articulate complex ideas clearly to a nontechnical business audience.   
  - Manage and control changes & scope.   
  - Lead analysis, design, development, implementation, and post implementation phases of data science modules.   
  - Lead work progress and address any questions or challenges regarding projects. Own progress reporting.   
  - Lead planning, execution, and delivery of data science modules within program.   
  - Identify risks, gaps, and opportunities and communicate to stakeholders and other teams to drive resolution   
Required Qualifications&nbsp;& Experience:  - Master’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or related field.   
  - Advanced understanding of probability, statistics, machine learning, data science.   
  - Expertise in data correlation/feature analysis, analysis of machine learning models, and optimizing models for accuracy.   
  - Proficiency in transforming and cleaning data & working across multiple models.   
  - Ability to research and manipulate complex and large data sets (both distributed and non-distributed).   
  - Strong ability to synthesize complex information.   
  - 3+ years’ experience in Python, Scala, Power BI, Excel, or similar.   
  - Excellent knowledge of anomalies/outliers detection using unsupervised algorithms – clustering, Local Outlier Factor, Isolation Forest , etc.   
  - Strong written and verbal communication skills.   
  - Experience in stakeholder management.   
  - Experience in leading cross geography data science teams.   
&nbsp;
